name: Hitler is my crash
description:
Hitler is my Crash is an absurd adventure in which you will plunge into the world of black humor and satire. You have to take on the role of a girl who is in love with Hitler and does not want to share him, and go on an absurd journey with Hitler, who is captured by saboteurs. The game offers a unique experience of exploring an alternative history, where absurdity and satire become key elements. Get ready for unpredictable adventures and humor that connoisseurs of non-standard gaming experiences will appreciate. Delve into the world of absurdity and laughter with Hitler is my Crash!

Hitler is my Crash is a satirical third-person shooter with elements of black humor, where you play as a girl in love with Adolf Hitler, having learned that your loved one has been kidnapped, you, like a real girl in love, go to capture the city where you will be stopped by communist soldiers in Nazi uniforms and other opponents, you need to FIND AND SAVE YOUR BELOVED ADOLF HITLER!


  • Small but dangerous traps
  • Enemies eager to kill you and prevent you from seeing your Beloved HITLER
  • Unusual and unexpected surprises
  • Dangerous BOSS and his servants who are holding their beloved HITLER
  • Beautiful anime girl who is crazy about Hitler
